facts.text: I'm bright yellow like a lemon! My color helps me blend in with the sunny coral reefs.
I have a secret weapon! There's a sharp spine near my tail that I use for defense.
I'm a vegetarian! I spend my days munching on algae growing on rocks and coral.
At night, my yellow color fades and I get a brown patch! It helps me hide while sleeping.
I love to hang out in big groups! We swim together looking for the tastiest algae.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs of Hawaii and the Pacific
